Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to me is that the picture was duplicated and this made everyone alike, good and bad, pritty and ugly. No wonder the good girl with the heart of gold and butterflies saved. But this is a tradition

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for with enough money one could emigrate. Who would want to live in the filth and disharmony of Earth? 'The League of Families' has a hand-out. They give a ticket to an impoverished family on the verge of starvation
